price: Enti monwane nkͻ mo Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ. Nokorε sε meyε kͻkͻbͻni pefee fri Nehͻ mamo.
arabic: فَفِرُّوٓاْ إِلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّي لَكُم مِّنۡهُ نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: fafirrū ilā al-lahi innī lakum min'hu nadhīrun mubīnun
